diff_hunk:
@@ -177,6 +177,7 @@ def hotpatch_var(var, prefix='USE_'):
 from tools.setup_helpers.mkldnn import (USE_MKLDNN, MKLDNN_LIBRARY,
                                         MKLDNN_LIB_DIR, MKLDNN_INCLUDE_DIR)
 from tools.setup_helpers.nnpack import USE_NNPACK
+from tools.setup_helpers.qnnpack import USE_QNNPACK
body: Please add `'QNNPACK'` to use_env_vars above as well as `NO_QNNPACK` entry to the top description. This will let people set `USE_QNNPACK` or `NO_QNNPACK` and things will still work.
body_html: Please add 'QNNPACK' to use_env_vars above as well as NO_QNNPACK entry to the top description. This will let people set USE_QNNPACK or NO_QNNPACK and things will still work.
body_text: Please add 'QNNPACK' to use_env_vars above as well as NO_QNNPACK entry to the top description. This will let people set USE_QNNPACK or NO_QNNPACK and things will still work.
